name: The worst part is that I have no viable option to replace my laptop, because Apple has a gaping hole in the middle of the lineup. The new 16" MBP looks great, but is far too big. The MacBook Air is underpowered for me. The 13" MBP hasn't been updated yet. Sigh.

content.html: The worst part is that I have no viable option to replace my laptop, because Apple has a gaping hole in the middle of the lineup. The new 16" MBP looks great, but is far too big. The MacBook Air is underpowered for me. The 13" MBP hasn't been updated yet. Sigh.

summary: Not that I think you’re willing to switch to a PC, but I just got a really nice ultralight / ultra-thin Lenovo

summary: Yeah, honestly, I am more likely to switch to Linux than Windows, but the Lenovo hardware is pretty solid for both. That said, I am just in too deep with the Apple ecosystem I think :)

content.html: Yeah, honestly, I am more likely to switch to Linux than Windows, but the Lenovo hardware is pretty solid for both. That said, I am just in too deep with the Apple ecosystem I think :)

summary: The Lenovo is a really nice machine & seemingly best value ... outsourced the research to my (retired) dad who looked across the spectrum including Macs

content.html: The Lenovo is a really nice machine & seemingly best value ... outsourced the research to my (retired) dad who looked across the spectrum including Macs
content.value: The Lenovo is a really nice machine & seemingly best value ... outsourced the research to my (retired) dad who looked across the spectrum including Macs

summary: I got what I assume is a similar Lenovo last December, and it's been a great machine so far. I do hate the Windows OS, but with my usage it's not worth switching. Were I willing to spend the time to learn I could see it being amazing with Linux. SSD for under $300 sold me.
